snippet.title: Realpolitiks 2 - Announcement Trailer. Grand Strategy game by Jujubee, Published by 1C Entertainment
snippet.description:
It's time for a second term! Realpolitiks 2 is set to launch this Fall on PC.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1248060/Realpolitiks_II/

Realpolitiks II, a real-time grand strategy game where you lead any contemporary nation in an attempt to secure world dominance. The road to supremacy is filled with modern world issues as you manage your nation’s economy, command armies, conduct diplomatic and espionage actions, and tackle global threats such as terrorism, pandemics, famine, and more.

Platforms: PC

For all the latest news on Realpolitiks 2, follow us on Facebook and Twitter!

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Jujubee/267210603352542
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/JujubeeGames

(C) 2020, JUJUBEE S.A. | http://jujubee.pl
